<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="">[Rewrite Possibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1299)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=132" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 15</row>

**Bloodline**
[Harrow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=18)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You continually glimpse into the target's future and nudge fate to guide them toward the best possible outcome. Due to the amount of information this spell requires you to process, you can't have more than one _rewrite possibility_ spell in effect at a time. Casting it again ends the previous casting. While _rewrite possibility_ is in effect, the target gains a +1 status bonus to initiative rolls. In addition, you gain the following reaction.

 **Rewrite Possibility** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The target fails a check; **Effect** The target rolls again with a +2 status bonus and uses the higher result.
